price: Na wakasema walio kufuru: Tutapo kuwa mchanga, sisi na baba zetu, hivyo kweli tutakuja tolewa?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ
footnotes: Wakasema makafiri kwa kukanya kufufuliwa: Hivyo sisi tukisha kuwa mchanga, na ikisha oza miili yetu na ya baba zetu walio tutangulia, ndio tutarejeshwa tutolewe upya tuwe wahai?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
